definition: matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
himematsutake mushroom (Agaricus subrufescens or Agaricus blazei Murill)

sentences.english: Benzaldehyde and benzyl alcohol are main volatile flavor compounds in Agaricus blazei.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲醛和苯甲醇是姬松茸中的主要風味物質。

sentences.english: Vegetation characteristics and functional division of Tricholoma matsutake habitat in Mt.
sentences.chinese: 研究了長白山松茸發生地的植被特徵及功能分區。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method and optimum conditions of Tricholoma matsutake mycelium fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究松茸菌絲體液體發酵方法和最佳條件。

sentences.english: But it's small due to a lack of rain.
sentences.chinese: 可惜今年雨水不足松茸太小。

sentences.english: Melt yak butter in a black clay pan, then add the slices of matsutake.
sentences.chinese: 用黑陶土鍋溶化酥油，放上切好的松茸生片。

sentences.english: The mycelial water extract is proved to be a high-effect and low-toxicity bio-pesticide.
sentences.chinese: 證明了姬松茸菌絲水提物是一種高效低毒的生物農藥。

sentences.english: This paper matsutake Fruitbody polysaccharide a systematic extraction and purification.
sentences.chinese: 本文對松茸子實體多糖進行了系統提取和純化研究。

sentences.english: Polysaccharide from submerged fermentation liquid of Agaricus blazei Murill obtains an prominent antitumor activity.
sentences.chinese: 姬松茸發酵全液多糖具有明顯的抗腫瘤活性。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic extraction polysaccharides by water from Agaricus Blazei Murill and mechanism are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了姬松茸多糖的超聲提取條件和強化機理。

sentences.english: Conclusion the mycelial polysaccharides from Agaricus blazei could be proved to play an essential role in antimutagenicity.
sentences.chinese: 結論姬松茸菌絲體多糖具有一定的防護輻射能力。

sentences.english: Matsutake can keep fresh for 3 days at most.
sentences.chinese: 松茸保鮮的極限是三天。

sentences.english: PTM has an obvious protective effect on hematopoietic function of X-rays irradiated mice.
sentences.chinese: 松茸多糖對輻射所致的造血損傷有明顯的保護作用。

definition: macrolepiota, mushroom native to Yunnan Province
himematsutake mushroom (Agaricus subrufescens or Agaricus blazei Murill)
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
see 冬蟲夏草|冬虫夏草[dong1 chong2 xia4 cao3]
